panels.title: Base data
hived block number
last irreversible block
type of block_flow_control used with the block
block id
official timestamp of the block
witness that signed the block
Blocks in time
Block stats
number of transactions contained in the block
size of block in bytes (uncompressed)
offset from block timestamp (in microseconds) when the block was considered valid
Before - info on transactions that came to the node between this and previous block
number of all incoming transactions (API+P2P)
number of those accepted as valid
number of failed due to authorization
number of failed due to lack of RC mana
After - info on pending transactions that are reapplied during phase 2
number of expired
number of failed (for other reasons than expiration)
number of reapplied
number of postponed
Exec - execution times (in microseconds)
offset from block timestamp when block was placed in the writer queue
how long block had to wait in writer queue before work started
time of actual work before the block was considered ready to be passed further
time spend on further phase(s) after main work was done
overall time spent by writer thread processing the block
